short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to generate text for sharing on SNS based on OGP data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to generate text for sharing on SNS based on OGP data.

With the page you want to share open, click on the icon of this extension to copy the text for social network sharing.

For example, if you run it in the repository of this extension (https://github.com/Robot-Inventor/beautiful-share ), it will copy the following text.
